description: Implementation of Adversarial Autoencoder with Theano
README.md: #Implementation of Adversarial Autoenocder (arXiv : http://arxiv.org/abs/1511.05644) Python codes for training Adversarial Autoenocder with Theano. You can train example models of Adversarial Autoencoder for MNIST on the ipython notebook. See https://github.com/takerum/adversarial_autoencoder/blob/master/train_adv_autoenc.ipynb . - The hidden code z of the trained adversarial autoencoder with 2-D uniform prior distribution. - The input x sampled from the trained adversarial autoencoder with 8-D gaussian prior distribution. ##Required libraries: python 2.7, theano 0.7.0 ##References: [1] Alireza Makhzani, Jonathon Shlens, Navdeep Jaitly and Ian Goodfellow. Adversarial Autoenocders. arXiv preprint (http://arxiv.org/abs/1511.05644).
